thread.title: Todd Coen Joins DC Digital Agency Blue Water as President

author: cnbc.com
title: Todd Coen Joins DC Digital Agency Blue Water as President

organizations.name: todd coen joins dc digital agency blue water

text:
Former Huge vice president and RedShell CEO Todd Coen, is the new president at Blue Water
WASHINGTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Blue Water , a full-service agency with a digital focus, headquartered in Washington, D.C. metro, adds significant strength to their leadership team with the addition of Todd Coen. Todd brings a wealth of knowledge, expertise, and enthusiasm along with him. Prior to joining Blue Water, Mr. Coen was vice president at Dynamics Research, before moving on to become founding member and vice president of the DC office of Huge. Most recently, Todd was the president and CEO of the consultancy, RedShell.
At Blue Water, Todd will be focused on meaningful growth, operations, and playing an active role in strategic development for Blue Water clients such as Audi of America, L3 Technology, Amtrak, and Johns Hopkins.
“Having someone like Todd in a leadership role is a game changer – which is clearly evident by the meaningful impact he made at other industry leading organizations over his career. Todd shares Blue Water’s passion for delivering amazing work and we are very excited to have him on our team,” remarked Blue Water CEO, Curt Schwab. Mr. Schwab will stay on as CEO and work closely with Mr. Coen and the rest of the Blue Water leadership team to continue making a positive impact for Blue Water clients and members of the Blue Water staff.
About Blue Water
Blue Water is a 360º digital agency that delivers exceptional online experiences for private and public-sector clients. We believe in cross-functional collaboration and that is why we operate at the intersection of strategy, creative/UX, technology, and marketing. This integrated approach underscores our commitment to realizing meaningful impact. By working with clients as our partners and users as our focus we turn digital challenges into endless possibilities. For more information visit www.bwm.com .
